SEARCH
Package uiclasses

Class ManagerUI

java.lang.Object
uiclasses.UserUI
uiclasses.EmployeeUI
uiclasses.ManagerUI
public class ManagerUI extends EmployeeUI
The ManagerUI class represents the user interface for a manager user. It extends the functionality of the EmployeeUI class and provides additional actions specific to a manager, such as managing courses, assigning teachers, and viewing teacher ratings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ManagerUI()
    Constructs a ManagerUI instance.
    ManagerUI(Manager manager)
    Constructs a ManagerUI instance with the specified manager user.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCourse()
    Adds a new course to the system, taking input for course details from the manager.
    void
    addNews()
    Adds news to the system by taking input from the manager for news title and details.
    void
    assignTeacherToCourse()
    Assigns teachers to a course by allowing the manager to select a course and available teachers.
    void
    deleteCourse()
    Deletes a course from the system based on the manager's selection.
    double
    getAverageRating()
    Calculates and returns the average rating of a selected teacher.
    void
    main()
    The main method to execute the manager user interface.
    void
    sendMessage()
    Allows the manager user to send a message to another user.
    void
    viewCourses()
    Displays the menu for managing courses, allowing the manager to add, view, and delete courses.
    void
    viewMessages()
    Displays a list of messages to the manager and allows them to view a specific message.
    void
    viewTeachersCourse()
    Displays the courses assigned to teachers, including the lector and practice teacher.
